about_the_game:
In Hoppin, a 3D action platformer, you'll be one of the last dragons to try to find out what happened to the other dragons. On your way to the top, various creatures will try to stop you. Play alone or with your friends to save the other dragons.

The movement is inspired by classic FPS titles, you can bunny hop, surf, strafe - and rocket jump to gain speed and height, set in a stylized, fantasy setting. Fight your way to the top and discover the truth about the dragons.
